body.name: Edospor Dash Cam for Cars with 64G SD Card, 3'' IPS Screen Car Camera, 176° Wide Angle Dash Camera, 1080P FHD Dashcam with IR Night Vision, Loop Recording, Parking Mode, G-Sensor, WDR
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 31 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 31 mins
features: 【1080P FHD & Best Cost-Effective】-Edospor dash cam can record videos with the resolution up to FHD 1080P. It can help you read key details such as road signs and vehicle license plates more clearly, bringing you better driving pleasure and better protection of your safety. Meanwhile, our car camera has integrated all mainstream technologies, can meet all your needs, and we also provide you with all the necessary accessories including a 64G SD card, giving you best cost-effective experience.

【3 Inch IPS Screen & 176° Wide Angle】-The large Full HD screen provides you with the clearest experience. The user interface through the larger screen is very clear, it is quite easy to operate and navigate the menus. The viewing angle range of this dash camera extends up to 176 degrees to both sides of the front of the vehicle, recording everything without blind spots for safe driving.

【Loop Recording & Evidence Preservation】-The car camera will automatically overwrite the oldest video with the newest video when the SD card is full. While driving, video can be automatically saved and stored locally on the micro SD memory card, ensuring that video evidence is captured and safely protected from overwriting. 64GB SD cards can typically record for up to 3 weeks. If you don't need the video when the card is full, simply manually delete or format it to re-record.

【Gravity Sensor & Automatic Locking】-Our dashcam is built in high-performance G-Sensor that automatically records emergencies and saves videos. When a vehicle collides, the dashcam automatically saves and locks the important footage currently being recorded as evidence. Except, press the lock button to manually lock the current video, so even if there is no impact but you see something interesting/important on the road you can lock in the footage.

【Super Night Vision & Parking Monitor】-Thanks to Exposure Comp & WDR technology, our car camera performs well in color precision and clarity whether day or night, can clearly capture the road conditions in the night. Then, If your vehicle is involved in a hit while parked, or someone attempts to steal your vehicle, the car camera will automatically turn on and start recording when it detects a vibration, providing protection for your car.

【Easy Installation & Super After-Sales】-With its slim and compact design, our car camera takes up very little space in your car and will not block your view while driving. Easy to install and set up, in addition to all the necessary accessories, a crowbar and detailed installation and use instructions are provided as an extra, so even first-time users need not worry. What's more, we will give you a 10-year warranty. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

【Accessories Upgrade: USB Reader】-On the basis of the original accessories, we added a USB reader to make it easier for you to read the video recorded on the SD card. And it will be more convenient than USB cable transmission (USB cable is also included in the package).
body.description: Three Operating Modes 1. Video Recording Mode Our car camera will automatically enter Video Recording Mode and start recording when connected to a car charger and power on. 2. Photo Taking Mode The A7 car camera can operate in Photo Taking Mode, and take HD photo up 12 Mega pixels. 3. Playback Mode This mode allows you to playback recording video or view photos. Specification: Video Resolution: 1080P FHD Photo Resolution: 12MP Screen: 3" IPS Screen Wide Angle Lens：176 degree Provide Free SD Card：64GB Loop Recording: OFF / 1 / 3 / 5 minutes G-Sensor: OFF / Low / Medium / High

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Edospor Dash Cam, Your Reliable Eye On The Road! Edospor Dash Cam, has integrated all mainstream technologies, can provide comprehensive protection for your car. It gets you out of trouble when you need evidence. When you're on a driving tour, it captures the scenery along the way for you. Whether it's the design, features or accessories, we are committed to creating the highest quality car camera, but also making it easy to install and use. Whether you are a private car owner, self-driving enthusiast, cab driver, Uber, or racing driver, our car recorder is definitely the best choice for you.

Package List: 1 * Edospor Dash Camera1 * 64GB SD Card1 * Car Mount1 * Charging Cable1 * Car Charger1 * Wiring Crowbar1 * USB data cable1 * User Manual Three Operating Modes 1. Video Recording Mode Our car camera will automatically enter Video Recording Mode and start recording when connected to a car charger and power on. 2. Photo Taking Mode The A7 car camera can operate in Photo Taking Mode, and take HD photo up 12 Mega pixels. 3. Playback Mode This mode allows you to playback recording video or view photos. Specification: Video Resolution: 1080P FHD Photo Resolution: 12MP Screen: 3" IPS Screen Wide Angle Lens：176 degree Provide Free SD Card：64GB Loop Recording: OFF / 1 / 3 / 5 minutes G-Sensor: OFF / Low / Medium / High

All Details Can Be Captured, Never Let Off Any Corner! 176°Wide Angle Lens Whether you want to capture the license plate number of the car in front of you or something important happening on the side, the 176°wide angle lens makes it easy to do so. The extra large field of view reduces blind spots, captures more details and preserves the real scene. 1080P Full HD Resolution Simultaneous recording with Super High Resolution 1080P@50fps Full HD Lens, and advanced GC CMOS + 6G lens deliver clearer videos&images and replay the key moment even when high speed driving. Build in Gravity Sensor It will lock the video file when an impact is detected and prevent the video file from being overwritten. The video will be saved automatically (prevented from being overwritten) when an impact is detected. You can also manually save the video by pressing the menu button while recording the video. The sensitivity of the G-Sensor can be changed by settings.

Seamless Loop Recording Our dash cam has loop recording, so older recordings are deleted to make room for new recordings. Continuous loop recording to minimize storage footprint. But locked video will not be covered. We provide you a large-capacity 64GB SD card that can typically record for up to 3 weeks at a time. Superior Video Quality in Night WDR algorithm automatically adjusts the optimal exposure balance, no more annoying overexposure and underexposure. The built-in large aperture absorbs more light and brightens dark scenes. Our car recorder can perform better in terms of color accuracy and clarity, capturing the road conditions at night more clearly. 24 Hours Parking Monitor If someone hits your car or a thief tries to damage your car while parked overnight, the car camera will automatically open and record video as soon as the impact is detected, providing 24/7 protection for your car.

Other Handy Features Easy To Transmit You can use the included mini USB data transfer cable to easily connect to your PC/MAC to play or backup videos. And we provide an additional USB card reader, which is more convenient than a USB cable to read the video in the SD card. One Click Lock If you witness an accident, an attempted accident, or want to manually save/lock the video, you can do so with the push of a button. The loop recording feature does not automatically delete all locked videos. 360°Rotatable Lens Our car recorder allow you to adjust the lens angle up and down 360° by tilting the car recorder mounting hinge. Find the right angle of view for your needs.

Warm Tips: 1.We provide you a free 64GB SD card, and it has been inserted in the car camera. And please format it when first use: Find the option of “Format” in dashcam and click “OK” button. 2.For safety reasons, the battery is only for urgent file saving in case of sudden power off. Make sure the car charger is plugged in for it to work properly. 3.The car camera will turn on/off automatically when the car's engine ignition is turned on/off. If the camera keeps turning off and on, check the adapter for a good connection or try a new adapter. Then format the memory card in the menu and reset to factory settings. 4.The car camera recording files can only be played on computer. To view the files, please remove the SD card and read it on the PC. 5.To access the menu settings, please press the OK button to stop the video recording first.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This dash cam works really well. Especially the night vision part. Records voice. Comes with SD card. Easy to use. Video is clear. Has easy features

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because of the large sd card and low price. My $50 Pilot dash cam died after 10 years and I needed a new one. This unit is great, clear instuctions, easy set up and a large sd card. Really like the screen saver feature that blanks out the sceen while displaying a recording indicator. Pulled the card last night and checked a few files - clear recordings.Ger a dash cam. I was rear ended and even with my camera facing forward....I was able to prove to the insurance co that I held my lane for 5 minutes prior to the crash. The 17 year old that hit me gave a rexcorded statement that I was cutting in and out of traffic....leaving him no choice when I cut in front of him and stopped. The camera proved different ......I sent the file to the adjustor and 10 minutes later they declared the 17 year old 100% at fault.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice inexpensive Dash-Cam. Check comments for potential issue with your vehicle.
reviews.reviewText: I like the camera. I believe it will work well for me and highly recommend it to anyone needing a low-cost dash-cam.I did have a problem powering the camera; They supply a very long power cord with a lighter plug fix attached. Problem is my new truck doesn't have any lighter outlets. (They are being phased out.) It does have lots of USB connectors, both Type A and Type C. The supplied USB cord is too short to reach anywhere and suffers from the problem outlined below. I used a longer cable with the correct connector. The truck sees a USB device and wants to connect to it. The Camera obliges but only as a camera or mass storage device. I don't want either mode. I want a dash-cam. There appears to be no way to turn data transfer off in the camera setup. I had to resolve the issue by using a USB cable that only had power wires and no data wires. That worked just fine. I believe this camera will serve me very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Clear
reviews.reviewText: Nice and compact, doesn't get in the way and clear picture. GREAT value since it was frreee with the back-up camera purchase. FYI, there were 4 or 5 other items to choose from, but we chose this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can't hold power
reviews.reviewText: This product is garbage. It turns on, then turns off. It doesn't make a sound when it turns off, only when it turns on, so you have no idea if it's on or off unless you're watching it, win defeats the purpose of having it. It turns back on if you unplug it and plug it back in, but after a few minutes, it turns off again. And, of course, it's not recording if it's off. I don't recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Picture and simple to use
reviews.reviewText: The camera has a great range of vision, it is made to be positioned higher on the window so less distracting and improved wide range. It is easy to operate, basically plug and use. Turns on and off automatically. The fact that is comes with an SD CARD is just great. It has worked well right out of the box, and we are very pleased with it. Price is very reasonable and quality is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this about 3 weeks now and it works great. this is an excellent car dash cam and I love it, very easy to install, very clear video with 1440P, and very compact, much smaller than the other dash cams I owned. Picture quality is sharp at 1440P or 1080P. even at night time in low lit areas. The camera comes with everything you see in the picture.An added bonus is the usb port on the back of the car power adaptor for the dash cam, so you have a port for charging your phones. the cable is plenty long enough for hiding and running along the car headliner and trim so not cable is dangling in your windshield view. it also provide a 64GB SD card.All in all a great little camera that you deserve to own.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: Good Camera, mounts easily. Won't pick up fog and the audio record feature, if you have your window rolled down or the music on is very muffled and distorted when recording. No other complaints.

This dash cam is great! It comes memory card and card adapter. Video quality is clear. The plug has a USB port so you can still charge other devices while the camera is plugged in. Installation is easy, just plug and play and the operation is very straightforward, you don't even need the instruction manual that comes with it. I highly recommend this product.

I recently purchased this car dashcam, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This dashcam offers top-notch video quality, even in low light conditions, ensuring I capture every detail on the road. The installation was a breeze, and its compact design doesn't obstruct my view. The included features like loop recording. Overall, this dashcam has exceeded my expectations, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and high-quality solution to enhance their driving experience. It's a five-star product through and through!

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to install, packed with lots of extras!
reviews.reviewText: Did not expect to see a lot of extras in the package to help make the installation of the camera power cord easier. Nice stick adhesive, multiple mounting bracket. Simple to operate once you get the hang of the menu buttons. Read the manual, it will help out a bit. Great camera for the price you pay. Quality is as expected, I just need something for the insurance company so they cant just go 50/50 fault or blaming me for causing the accident.

Great little camera. It's all you need. Does the job great. Ready to record straight from the box. Came WITH a 64gb micro sd card. Didn't have to go buy one. Only bad thing I can think of is trying to "hide" the wire when I mount it on the windshield, but I'm the only one driving so I don't care.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great camera for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have been using the camera for several days, everything works fine. Video resolution is very good! The camera is very easy to use. Excellent to keep on the windshield and does not interfere with the view of the road. I recommend this camera for purchase!
